humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions 'Number of positive lymph nodes: 3. Total number sampled: 19.' This indicates that the patient has metastases in 3 out of 19 lymph nodes, which corresponds to N1 stage according to the AJCC staging system.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic ductal carcinoma in three of nineteen lymph nodes (3/19), as stated in the pathology report. This indicates a pathologic N1 stage according to the TNM staging system for cancer.
